shape_2_per_frame1=//// log tower
shape_2_per_frame2=
shape_2_per_frame3=i=instance;                         sample=i/num_inst;
shape_2_per_frame4=p=int(10*sample);                   t=3*time; 
shape_2_per_frame5=c1=bnot(instance%sin(time));               c2=bnot(instance%30);
shape_2_per_frame6=
shape_2_per_frame7=rad=-rad*log(10/p);                 rad=rad*(1-.8*c1);
shape_2_per_frame8=
shape_2_per_frame9=x=.14*sin(5*sample+.2*t);           y=.5*sample*sin(sample+.16*t);
shape_2_per_frame10=x=x+3*c1*rad*sin(log(.1*i)*t);      y=y+3*c1*rad*cos(log(.1*i)*t);
shape_2_per_frame11=x=.5+ x/q6;                         y=.5+ y/q5;
shape_2_per_frame12=
shape_2_per_frame13=r=if(c1,1,-.1+sample);              r2=r+.1*c1;
shape_2_per_frame14=g=if(c2,.2,r);                      g2=r2;
shape_2_per_frame15=b=g;                                b2=r2;
shape_2_per_frame16=a=1-bnot(i-10);                     a2=a;
shape_2_per_frame17=border_a=.1*a;
shape_2_per_frame18=
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=50
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=100

shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=1.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
per_frame_1=decay=.1;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=zoom=1;
per_frame_4=warp=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=q5=aspectx;
per_frame_7=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=bt=bt+bass_att/fps;
per_frame_11=q1=bt;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_grad3;
warp_2=`
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float2  uv2 =  uv;
warp_7=`    uv2 = uv + texsize.zx*(q3,q3)*(bass*100);
warp_8=`    float3 color = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_9=`color-=slow_roam_sin*slow_roam_cos.wzy*.4;
warp_10=`    color += atan(tex2D(sampler_noise_mq, uv2)) - 0.5; 
warp_11=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, ((uv-0.5)*(0.98 + rad*0.02)) + 0.5 + GetBlur3((uv - 0.5)*0.9 + 0.5)*0.1  - 0.01).xyz + color*0.01;    
warp_15=`float3 ret7=ret;
warp_16=`ret.z=1-ret7.x;
warp_17=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_18=`                      ((uv2.xyy*q27
warp_19=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_20=`                      ).xyz*
warp_21=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_22=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_23=`                     );
warp_24=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_25=`ret.x=1-ret7.y;
warp_26=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_27=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_28=`    ret = ret;// - 0.08; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_29=`ret.y=1-ret7.z;
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xxx;
comp_4=`    ret *= ret;
comp_5=`    //ret = sqrt(ret); //gamma
comp_6=`    ret = pow(ret,float3(.5+q5,.5+q6,.5+q7));
comp_7=`}
